meanings.definition: The act of making a loud, sharp noise while eating something hard.
meanings.sent1: The crunching of the chips was so loud.
meanings.sent2: I love the sound of crunching on a carrot.
meanings.sent3: The crunching of the popcorn made everyone in the movie theater turn around.
meanings.sent4: The crunching of the leaves underfoot sounded like music to her ears.
meanings.sent5: The crunching of the snow beneath his boots echoed through the quiet forest.

meanings.definition: The act of crushing something with a noisy, grinding sound.
meanings.sent1: The crunching of the rocks under the heavy truck was deafening.
meanings.sent2: The crunching of the gears signaled a problem with the machine.
meanings.sent3: The crunching of the ice cubes in the blender sounded like a rock concert.
meanings.sent4: The crunching of the glass bottles being recycled was oddly satisfying.
meanings.sent5: The crunching of the branches in the wood chipper could be heard from far away.

meanings.definition: The act of moving with a noisy, grinding sound.
meanings.sent1: The crunching of the gravel under the car tires was unmistakable.
meanings.sent2: The crunching of the snow under his boots echoed in the quiet night.
meanings.sent3: The crunching of the gears in the old clock made it hard to sleep.
meanings.sent4: The crunching of the gears in the old clock made it hard to sleep.
meanings.sent5: The crunching of the gears in the old clock made it hard to sleep.
